document_data.name: Lhestyn Silmaeril
document_data.mainbody: '''Lhestyn Silmaeril''', nicknamed '''the Masked Lady''' was one of the [[Lords of Waterdeep#Open Lord|Open Lords]] of [[Waterdeep]] during the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/Realms by Night/Part Four: Lhestyn's Court}} There was a statue of her placed in [[Heroes' Garden]].{{Cite web/Realms by Night/Part Seven: Kahla the Ghost of Heroes' Garden}}
document_data.Relationships: Lhestyn was the child of [[Baeron Silmaeril]] and [[Shilarn]], two other Lords of Waterdeep. Her husband was [[Zelphar Arunsun]], son of [[Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]].
document_data.History:
Lhestyn was born in [[Waterdeep]] in the {{YearlinkName|1276}}. 

In the {{YearlinkName|1298}}, Lhestyn infiltrated the outlawed [[Shadow Thieves]] and exposed their activities, causing the deaths of many of their members and forcing others to leave the city. Over the course of a [[tenday]], she duped approximately fifty Shadow Thieves into ambushes at what later became known as [[Lhestyn's Court]].

Lhestyn married [[Zelphar Arunsun]] in the {{YearlinkName|1300}}, 

She had a brief tenure as Open Lord, eventually dying in the {{YearlinkName|1314}}.
